subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled over Jaipur between 1803 and 1947?
question_hi: जयपुर में 1803 से 1947 तक कौन सी राजधानी के राजधानी दिए गए थे ?
explanation_en: The Kachhwaha Rajputs were the ruling family of Jaipur between 1803 and 1947.
explanation_hi: 1803 से 1947 तक, कचहावा राजपूत का राजधाना था।
